meanings.definition: a tropical fruit with a sweet, grainy texture
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the sapodillas for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh sapodillas every week.
meanings.sent3: The sapodillas danced in the fruit bowl, tempting me to eat them.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as sapodillas on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The ripe sapodillas looked like golden jewels on the tree.

meanings.definition: the edible fruit of a tropical evergreen tree
meanings.sent1: She savored the juicy sapodillas during her picnic.
meanings.sent2: The children happily munched on the ripe sapodillas.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the sapodillas from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The sapodillas glistened in the sunlight like precious gems.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sapodillas filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: a tree of the sapodilla family, native to Mexico and Central America
meanings.sent1: The sapodillas tree provided shade in the hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: We admired the tall sapodillas in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys played hide-and-seek in the sapodillas tree.
meanings.sent4: The ancient sapodillas stood like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The rustling leaves of the sapodillas whispered stories of the past.
